    • Method Detail

      • showActionListDialog

        public static void showActionListDialog(GUIScreen owner,
                        String title,
                        String description,
                        Action... actions)
        Will display a dialog prompting the user to select an action from a list. The label of each action will be the result of calling toString() on each Action object.

      • showActionListDialog

        public static void showActionListDialog(GUIScreen owner,
                        String title,
                        String description,
                        int itemWidth,
                        Action... actions)
        Will display a dialog prompting the user to select an action from a list. The label of each action will be the result of calling toString() on each Action object.

      • showActionListDialog

        public static void showActionListDialog(GUIScreen owner,
                        String title,
                        String description,
                        int itemWidth,
                        boolean closeBeforeAction,
                        Action... actions)
        Will display a dialog prompting the user to select an action from a list. The label of each action will be the result of calling toString() on each Action object.
        Parameters:
        owner - Screen to display the dialog on
        title - Title of the dialog
        description - Description label inside the dialog
        itemWidth - Width of the labels in the list, this will effectively set how wide the dialog is
        closeBeforeAction - When an action in chosen, should the dialog be closed before the action is executed?
        actions - List of actions inside the dialog
